name: Bank Customers
business_purpose: Master customer registry used for onboarding, segmentation, and KYC compliance reporting.

key_columns.name: customer_code
key_columns.business_meaning: External customer code used in operations

key_columns.name: segment
key_columns.business_meaning: Business segment such as retail or sme

common_queries: SELECT segment, COUNT(*) FROM bank_customers GROUP BY segment
SELECT kyc_status, COUNT(*) FROM bank_customers GROUP BY kyc_status
gotchas: Use customer_id for joins; customer_code is user-facing and may change
